casebody.data:
DAYCO, Inc., Petitioner, Appellant, v. Paul J. GOLDSTEIN, Trustee, Appellee. No. 5007. United States Court of Appeals First Circuit. Oct. 27, 1955. James P. McGuire, Fall River, Mass,, for appellant. Sidney J. Kagan, Boston, Mass., with whom Richmond, Rosen & Kagan, Boston, Mass., was on brief, for appellee.

Before MAGRUDER, Chief Judge, and WOODBURY and HARTTGAN, Circuit J udges.

PER CURIAM.

The order of the District Court is affirmed.
